sentences.sContent: Remember to use not only the hourly wage, but also include fringe benefits.
sentences.sContent_eng: Remember to use not only the hourly wage, but also include fringe benefits.
sentences.sCn: 切记不要仅仅使用小时工资，还要包括附加福利。

phrases.pCn: 电视接收边缘区；边缘地区；干扰区域
条纹反差；干涉条纹对比；条纹衬比度条

remMethod.val: f ＋ ring(环) ＋ e → 环绕的部分 → 边缘

words.tran: 具流苏的，具的（等于fringy）；加穗的；带边饰的

trans.tranCn: 刘海；饰以流苏的边；边缘，外围
trans.tranOther: if you have a fringe, your hair is cut so that it hangs down over your forehead
to be around the edge of something
